Articles.Content:
So after yesterday\'s excellent performance of the SABOT-1 Rocket (Solar and Biological Observation Transport-1) , I decided to build a SABOT-2 rocket, this time with an extra shell of boosters to allow a longer acceleration period, and here are the results...

My highest velocity achieved (and these are normally not cheat parts, being from the Intrepid Pack, they are simply pushing a far, far smaller payload than they\'re built for) is 230km/s at Kerbol\'s greatest point of influence.
